hero.subtitle: Property management simplified.
hero.description: Aqaratech provides a comprehensive, easy-to-use platform where you can manage multiple properties, keep track of important tasks and deadlines, and quickly access important information â€“ all in one place.

bullets.track: Comprehensive tracking of property-related data, including units, leases, tenants, and more.
bullets.visualize: Visualize your properties' financial data to identify trends and patterns over time. Use our interactive dashboards to view income, expenses, and profit/loss for each portfolio, property, and unit.
bullets.monitor: Monitor your properties' occupancy rates and vacancy periods using heatmaps.

bullets.track: Easy tracking and management of rental payments and lease agreements.
Comprehensive expense tracking provides you with valuable granularity for expense analysis. Choose to attribute expenses to a portfolio, property, or even a single unit.
bullets.categorize: Categorize expenses using a hierarchical system to better understand your expense sources.
bullets.visualize: Visualize expenses using interactive treemaps, which allow you to quickly identify your cost patterns.

bullets.customizable: Customizable filters, so you can focus on the information that is most relevant to you.
bullets.properties: Filter your properties and tenant data by location, including specific properties or units within properties.
bullets.time: Filter by time, including specific date ranges or time periods.

bullets.upload: Store and manage important documents related to your properties and tenants, including lease agreements, rental payment receipts, and maintenance records.
bullets.access: Access your documents from anywhere, using any device.

bullets.all: Search through all of your data at the same time.
bullets.spell: Find what you're looking for without knowing the exact spelling.

managers.name: Streamline your workflows
managers.description: Leverage our powerful tools to keep track of all your properties. Aqaratech helps you organize your business and work more efficiently.

owners.name: Complete visibility
owners.description: Use our dashboard to access and monitor all of your property information, granting you peace of mind helping you make informed decisions.

tenants.name: Hassle-free rentals
tenants.description: Aqaratech simplifies the rental process by allowing tenants to track their payments and leases.

callToAction.title: Get started today
callToAction.description: Try Aqaratech and experience the ease and convenience of managing your properties with just a few clicks! Sign up now and see the difference it can make for your business.
